question:
which of the following statements is/are correct regarding the Fatu Hiva monarch?
1) It is endemic to Marquesas Islands, French Polynesia.
2) The IUCN status of the Fatu Hiva monarch is critically endangered.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The scientific name of the Fatu Hiva monarch is Pomarea whitneyi. It is endemic to Marquesas Islands, French Polynesia. The IUCN status of the Fatu Hiva monarch is critically endangered.
